text: People have different ways of working.
Some like to start early, and other like to start late.
Some people are just more serious in general.
I think the important thing
is to get your work done and do it well.
Our reading asks the question,
"What's the best way to work?"
If you can wake up early and be ready to start the day,
you're a morning person.
You enjoy those early hours of the day.
"Extra" means additional.
If you go the extra mile, you make the additional effort.
You do more than what people expect.
Listen for "go the extra mile"
and "morning person" in the reading.
I think we can all agree that it's important
to be responsible at work.
But can we take work too seriously sometimes?
Perhaps.
Do you find time to relax and have some fun?
